How do I recover my cryptocurrency assets if I lose my keys with Verus ID?

Actually, with Verus ID, you can recover your cryptocurrency assets even if you lose your keys. Verus ID provides a solution to the problem of losing access to your funds due to lost keys. It offers revocable and recoverable identities, which means that you can recover your identity and access your funds even if you lose your keys.
